item.title: Elasticsearch
item.description: 目录 start Elasticsearch Install Java 目录 end|2020-06-24 02:06| Elasticsearch Official Guide 参考: Elasticsearch 快速开始 Install install | Docker Guide to Elasticsearch in Java docker run -d --name es7 --net es-network -p 9200:9200 -p 9300:9300 -e "discovery.type=single-node" -e ES_JAVA_OPTS="-Xms2560m -Xmx2560m" elasticsearch:7.14.2 GUI 浏览器插件： Elasticvue
